sentences.en: ...the first book ever written in Cajun.
sentences.cn: ...用美国路易斯安纳州的法国后裔讲的法语方言写成的第一本书。

sentences.en: Cajun Chicken Rice, the sauce is sweet and sour, the taste is unique but yet delicious.
sentences.cn: 炸鸡饭的酱料蛮特别, 酸酸甜甜的味道还不错.

sentences.en: I hear he frequents the Cajun restaurant in Hampstead.
sentences.cn: 我听说他经常光顾汉普斯特德的卡津餐厅。

sentences.en: Ian : Well , when was the last time that you made chowder ? Cajun chicken ? Or even home - fries?
sentences.cn: 伊安: 那你上次做巧达汤、纽奥良炸鸡,或自己炸薯条又是什麽时候 呢 ?

sentences.en: If you like catfish, then you might like our Cajun catfish sandwich.
sentences.cn: 如果您喜欢鲶鱼, 那么您可以试试我们的凯郡酱鲶鱼三明治.

sentences.en: In the southern state of Louisiana, people enjoy spicy Cajun and Creole foods.
sentences.cn: 在南部的路易斯安那州, 人们喜欢吃辛辣的卡真人的食品和克利奥尔人的食品.
他们演奏了一些卡津音乐。

sentences.en: Today, Cajun music is popular not only in Louisiana but also nationwide.
sentences.cn: 时至今日, 卡津音乐不只深受路易斯安那州的居民喜爱,也受到全国民众的喜爱.

trans.tran_cn: 移居美国路易斯安纳州的法人后裔
trans.tran_en: A Cajun is a person of Cajun origin
